keys.string: Nothing much, still just trying to get used to the new surroundings. You?
Enjoying the quiet before the storm; thankfully the homework hasn’t really picked up yet.
I feel that. Do you have any ideas what to do after I’m done with my homework?
[None]Mojo: The Grouping?! Sure, I’d love to play sometime!”
[None]Uh…. I don’t really…. Like card games.
[None]I think I’ll just go get extra caught up on my homework.
[None]If you teach me, I’m up for trying it
Heck yeah! You know, I wasn’t too sure about you to begin with, but now I guess you’re pretty cool. Just let me know when you’re ready. See yah!
Excuse me? Did I just here that blasphemy come from your mouth? Get out. Now. And NEVER come back!
That’s pretty fair. Just remember, I’m always here if you wanna play.
Cool! I’m gonna finish the little homework I do have, just stop by any time and remind me.

ArrayOfString.string: [Player][Dialog]Nothing much, still just trying to get used to the new surroundings. You?
[Seth][Dialog]Enjoying the quiet before the storm; thankfully the homework hasn’t really picked up yet.
[Player][Dialog]I feel that. Do you have any ideas what to do after I’m done with my homework?

[Seth][Option] Well, besides studying more homework- which is what I would recommend- I guess you could look around the dorms a little more. Or you could play some Mojo with me, I’m ready for that anytime.
[None]Mojo: The Grouping?! Sure, I’d love to play sometime!”
[None]Uh…. I don’t really…. Like card games.
[None]I think I’ll just go get extra caught up on my homework.
[None]If you teach me, I’m up for trying it
[Seth][Dialog]Heck yeah! You know, I wasn’t too sure about you to begin with, but now I guess you’re pretty cool. Just let me know when you’re ready. See yah!
[Seth][Dialog]Excuse me? Did I just here that blasphemy come from your mouth? Get out. Now. And NEVER come back!
[Seth][Dialog]That’s pretty fair. Just remember, I’m always here if you wanna play.
[Seth][Dialog]Cool! I’m gonna finish the little homework I do have, just stop by any time and remind me.
